entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Rigolet
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:53 PM NST Friday 24 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Clear. Low minus 29.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 29. Wind chill near minus 44. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:30 PM NST Friday 24 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Sunny. High minus 23.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 23. Wind chill minus 42 in the morning and minus 34 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:30 PM NST Friday 24 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: A few clouds. Low minus 29.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light near midnight. Low minus 29. Wind chill minus 34 in the evening and minus 40 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:30 PM NST Friday 24 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Sunny. High minus 19.
entry.summary: Sunny. High minus 19. Forecast issued 4:30 PM NST Friday 24 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Clear. Low minus 23.
entry.summary: Clear. Low minus 23. Forecast issued 4:30 PM NST Friday 24 February 2023

entry.title: Monday: Sunny. High minus 17.
entry.summary: Sunny. Windy. High minus 17. Forecast issued 4:30 PM NST Friday 24 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Clear. Low minus 23.
entry.summary: Clear. Low minus 23. Forecast issued 4:30 PM NST Friday 24 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 15. POP 60%
